content: superwarm cowl that also doubles as a hood i chose to make it out of an acrylic yarn so that it wasn t itchy around the neck but you could use a wool blend for added luxury cowl is worked in half treble us half_double_crochet throughout materials james brett marble 100% acrylic 341yds/312m per 200g ball 1 x 200g ball or any suitable chunky yarn 6mm uk4 usj/10 crochet hook size 16in 40cm high 32in 80cm circumference gauge 12 sts x 8 row to 10cm measured over half treble on 6mm crochet hook
